price: 13. À quoi leur sert-il (aujourd’hui) de se souvenir, quand un Messager explicite est déjà venu à eux ?
arabic: أَنَّىٰ لَهُمُ ٱلذِّكۡرَىٰ وَقَدۡ جَآءَهُمۡ رَسُولٞ مُّبِينٞ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: annā lahumu al-dhik'rā waqad jāahum rasūlun mubīnun
